import React, {useState} from 'react' import './Form.css' function Form({addItem}){ const [formState, setFormState] = useState({ item_name: '', description: '', original_pricing: 0, condition: 0, image_url: '', user_id: 1 }) function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() fetch('http://localhost:9292/itemsubmit', { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ item_name: formState.item_name, description: formState.description, original_pricing: formState.original_pricing, condition: formState.condition, image_url: formState.image_url, user_id: formState.user_id }) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(newestItem => addItem(newestItem)) } useEffect( () => { addItem },[]) function handleChange(e){ setFormState({...formState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return ( <>

Add New Item You Want to Swap

) } export default Form;
